content: Quick logic puzzle! suits well for shortest/reverse mode. But I'd suggest specifying that the pairs are disjoint (1-2, 3-4...), as the current wording could be interpreted as a domino effect (Luckily, the example clears up the ambiguity).

Thanks for the suggestion. The problem was mainly designed for reverse mode, but it is also valid for other modes. Iâ€™ve included additional test cases to ensure the expected behavior is clear and to minimize ambiguity
